member.summary: Adds a custom step to the LeanFT report including the image from the specified path.
member.param: The name of the reported step. This name is the label of the step node in the report.
The description of the reported step. The description is displayed in the Details pane of the report.
The for the step.
The full path of the image to display for the step. Supported image types: BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF

The to use for the step.

member.name: T:HP.LFT.Report.ReportLevel
member.summary: The possible levels for reporting events to the LeanFT Report.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.ReportLevel.All
member.summary: Report events from all levels.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.ReportLevel.Warning
member.summary: Report only events with the status Warning or Error.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.ReportLevel.Error
member.summary: Report only events with the status Error.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.ReportLevel.Off
member.summary: Disable all report levels. A LeanFT report is not created.

member.name: T:HP.LFT.Report.ReportException
member.summary: The exceptions thrown when errors occur in Reporter objects.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportException class with serialized data.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Report.ReportException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportException class.

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Report.ReportException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportException class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message with the reason for this exception.
The inner exception that caused this exception.

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Report.ReportException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportException class with the specified error message.
member.param: The error message with the reason for this exception.

member.name: P:HP.LFT.Report.ReportException.ErrorCode
member.summary: The error code associated with the exception, if applicable.

member.name: T:HP.LFT.Report.Status
member.summary: The possible statuses of an event reported to the LeanFT report.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.Status.Passed
member.summary: The event related to the node and all of its sub-nodes succeeded.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.Status.Warning
member.summary: The event related to the node or to one of its sub-nodes resulted in a warning.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.Status.Failed
member.summary: The event related to the node or to one of its sub-nodes failed.

member.name: T:HP.LFT.Report.CaptureLevel
member.summary: The possible levels for capturing snapshots for the report.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.CaptureLevel.All
member.summary: Snapshots are captured for all test object operations.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.CaptureLevel.OnError
member.summary: Snapshots are captured only for test object operations with errors.

member.name: F:HP.LFT.Report.CaptureLevel.Off
member.summary: Snapshots are not captured for test object operations.

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Report.ReporterInstance.ReportEvent(System.String,System.String,HP.LFT.Report.Status,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a custom step to the LeanFT report including the image from the specified path.
member.param: The name of the reported step. This name is the label of the step node in the report.
The description of the reported step. The description is displayed in the Details pane of the report.
The status for the step.
The full path of the image to display for the step. Supported image types: BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Report.ReporterInstance.ReportEvent(System.String,System.String,HP.LFT.Report.Status,System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Adds a custom step to the LeanFT report including the provided image object.
member.param: The name of the reported step. This name is the label of the step node in the report.
The description of the reported step. The description is displayed in the Details pane of the report.
The status for the step.
The to use for the step.

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Report.ReporterInstance.ReportEvent(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a custom step to the LeanFT with default status "Passed".
member.param: The name of the reported step. This name is the label of the step node in the report.
The description of the reported step. The description is displayed in the Details pane of the report.

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Report.ReporterInstance.ReportEvent(System.String,System.String,HP.LFT.Report.Status,System.Exception,System.String)

member.param: The name of the reported step. This name is the label of the step node in the report.
The description of the reported step. The description is displayed in the Details pane of the report.
The status for the step.
The exception that occurred.
The full path of the image to display for the step. Supported image types: BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF
